text:
Hi, I just needed to ask a question because I could not find anything about this
in the documentation.  I wanted to ask: "can you specify and page device
commands when rendering to post script?"
If this is not possible, do you have any suggestions of how I could add page
device commands to the postscript. (I am already considering editing the ps
document)

Thank you very very much...
Amit
creator: amitr@hemtech.co.za
jeremias.maerki@outline.ch
text:
This is probably the wrong place to place questions. The mailing list would be 
better. Anyway, the device control commands are on the todo list. You could try 
to extend PSRenderer to include what you need. I've also done editing of PS 
files. It worked for me.
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
creator: gadams@apache.org
